Mt Albert pool near-drowning: Family of boy found unconscious at Auckland pool thanks doctor for saving their boy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mt-albert-pool-near-drowning-family-of-boy-found-unknown-at-auckland-pool-thanks-doctor-for- saving-their-男孩/H6VLGQECVFEQRMVIJS6STW7Q3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mt-albert-pool-near-drowning-family-of-boy-found-unknown-at-auckland-pool-thanks-doctor-for- saving-their-男孩/H6VLGQECVFEQRMVIJS6STW7Q3Q/ Kirsty WynnWitnesses said boy was pulled from water by a member of the public - not lifeguards. Sat, 11 May 2024 23:15:18 +0000 The boy's father would like to thank the off-duty doctor who resuscitated his son and the man who pulled the unconscious boy from the water.
Another central Whanganui intersection to get roundabout trial https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/another-central-whanganui-intersection-to-get-roundabout-trial/4CTQL54255BXNKF4YPK4FYLPKA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/another-central-whanganui-intersection-to-get-roundabout-trial/4CTQL54255BXNKF4YPK4FYLPKA/ It will be similar to the new road layout at the Guyton and Wicksteed intersection. Taranaki drink-driver more than six times the limit when he crashed into off-duty police officer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-drink-driver-more-than-six-times-the-limit-when-he-crashed-into-off-duty-police-officer/2KOJYTN24NFAFAGUPIF7OYYA4E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-drink-driver-more-than-six-times-the-limit-when-he-crashed-into-off-duty-police-officer/2KOJYTN24NFAFAGUPIF7OYYA4E/ Tara ShaskeyMatters then got worse when the driver tried to punch the officer in the face. Hamilton City Councillor questions spending $70,000 on te reo Māori app for staff https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamilton-city-councillor-questions-spending-70000-on-te-reo-maori-app-for-staff/6DKPDJVJ2RAXLAYXO3GN7YD7QQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamilton-city-councillor-questions-spending-70000-on-te-reo-maori-app-for-staff/6DKPDJVJ2RAXLAYXO3GN7YD7QQ/ The app has been decried as a 'luxury' when the cost of living was already high.
